languages.text: {n}Авель с умеренным любопытством рассматривает быт техноварваров, но не делает попыток приблизиться к ним и вступить в контакт. Иногда, когда взгляд его падает на какой-нибудь священный предмет, покрытый дикарскими рисунками или подвергнутый иной форме поругания, брови его страдальчески поднимаются.{/n}

{n}Abel looks upon the tech-barbarians with a moderate degree of curiosity, without attempting to approach or interact with them. Occasionally his gaze rests on some sacred item covered in tribal imagery or otherwise desecrated, and he raises his eyebrows, evidently pained.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Авель с умеренным любопытством рассматривает быт техноварваров, но не делает попыток приблизиться к ним и вступить в контакт. Иногда, когда взгляд его падает на какой-нибудь священный предмет, покрытый дикарскими рисунками или подвергнутый иной форме поругания, брови его страдальчески поднимаются.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel looks upon the tech-barbarians' daily life with a moderate degree of curiosity, without attempting to approach or interact with them. Occasionally his gaze rests on some sacred item that's covered in tribal imagery or otherwise desecrated, and he raises his eyebrows, evidently pained.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}アベルは技術未開人たちに対してそれなりの好奇心を持ちつつ見ているが、傍観するだけで近づこうとも関わろうともしない。時折、部族民を想起させる神聖な品々や冒涜的な物品に視線を注ぎ、そしてあからさまに苦々しく、眉をひそめるのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks upon the tech-barbarians with a moderate degree of curiosity, without attempting to approach or interact with them. Occasionally his gaze rests on some sacred item covered in tribal imagery or otherwise desecrated, and he raises his eyebrows, evidently pained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルは技術未開人たちに対してそれなりの好奇心を持ちつつ見ているが、傍観するだけで近づこうとも関わろうともしない。時折、部族民を想起させる神聖な品々や冒涜的な物品に視線を注ぎ、そしてあからさまに苦々しく、眉をひそめるのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯略带好奇地观察着技术蛮人们，但并没有试着接近他们，或是与他们互动。他的目光偶尔会停留在某些神圣物件上，这些物件绘着部落涂鸦或是其他亵渎的东西。亚伯扬起眉毛，表情痛苦不已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks upon the tech-barbarians with a moderate degree of curiosity, without attempting to approach or interact with them. Occasionally his gaze rests on some sacred item covered in tribal imagery or otherwise desecrated, and he raises his eyebrows, evidently pained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯略带好奇地观察着技术蛮人们的生活，但并没有试着接近他们，或是与他们互动。他的目光偶尔会停留在某些神圣物件上，这些物件绘着部落涂鸦或是其他亵渎的东西。亚伯扬起眉毛，表情痛苦不已。{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel observe les technobarbares avec un certain intérêt sans pour autant chercher à s'approcher ou à interagir avec eux. De temps en temps, il pose le regard sur un objet sacré qui semble avoir été recouvert de symboles tribaux et ne peut s'empêcher de hausser les sourcils, visiblement peiné.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks upon the tech-barbarians with a moderate degree of curiosity, without attempting to approach or interact with them. Occasionally his gaze rests on some sacred item covered in tribal imagery or otherwise desecrated, and he raises his eyebrows, evidently pained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel observe les technobarbares avec un certain intérêt sans pour autant chercher à s'approcher ou à interagir avec eux. De temps en temps, il pose le regard sur un objet sacré qui semble avoir été recouvert de symboles tribaux et ne peut s'empêcher de hausser les sourcils, visiblement peiné.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel contempla a los tecnobárbaros con cierta curiosidad, sin intentar acercarse o interactuar con ellos. De vez en cuando, posa la mirada en algún objeto sagrado cubierto de imágenes tribales o profanado de alguna otra manera, y levanta las cejas, claramente afligido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks upon the tech-barbarians with a moderate degree of curiosity, without attempting to approach or interact with them. Occasionally his gaze rests on some sacred item covered in tribal imagery or otherwise desecrated, and he raises his eyebrows, evidently pained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel contempla a los tecnobárbaros con cierta curiosidad, sin intentar acercarse o interactuar con ellos. De vez en cuando, posa la mirada en algún objeto sagrado cubierto de imágenes tribales o profanado de alguna otra manera, y levanta las cejas, claramente afligido.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel blickt mit einem gewissen Maß an Neugier auf das Leben der Techbarbaren, ohne zu versuchen, sich ihnen zu nähern oder mit ihnen zu interagieren. Gelegentlich fällt sein Blick auf einen heiligen Gegenstand, der mit Stammesmalereien verziert oder auf andere Weise entweiht wurde, und er hebt die Augenbrauen. Offenbar schmerzen ihn solche Schändungen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks upon the tech-barbarians with a moderate degree of curiosity, without attempting to approach or interact with them. Occasionally his gaze rests on some sacred item covered in tribal imagery or otherwise desecrated, and he raises his eyebrows, evidently pained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel blickt mit einem gewissen Maß an Neugier auf das Leben der Techbarbaren, ohne zu versuchen, sich ihnen zu nähern oder mit ihnen zu interagieren. Gelegentlich fällt sein Blick auf einen heiligen Gegenstand, der mit Stammesmalereien verziert oder auf andere Weise entweiht wurde, und er hebt die Augenbrauen. Offenbar schmerzen ihn solche Schändungen.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel; tekno barbarlara ne az ne çok sayılabilecek bir merakla bakıyor, onlara yaklaşmaya veya onlarla etkileşime geçmeye yeltenmiyor. Ara sıra bakışları, üzerine kabile resimleri çizilmiş veyahut da kirletilmiş kutsal nesnelere kayıyor. Böyle olunca da kaşlarını acılı bir tavırla kaldırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Abel looks upon the tech-barbarians with a moderate degree of curiosity, without attempting to approach or interact with them. Occasionally his gaze rests on some sacred item covered in tribal imagery or otherwise desecrated, and he raises his eyebrows, evidently pained.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel, tekno barbarlara orta ölçekli bir merakla bakıyor, onlara yaklaşmaya veya onlarla etkileşime geçmeye yeltenmiyor. Ara sıra bakışları, üzerine kabile resimleri çizilmiş veyahut da kirletilmiş kutsal nesnelere kayıyor ve kaşlarını acılı bir tavırla kaldırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
